item.title: Report X-2023081326
item.description:
Report X-2023081326

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-25T18:14:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-15
  • City: COLUMBUS
  • State: NE
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO FIVE PACKAGES DUE TO THE RATTLE SOUND OF AEROSOL CANS. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED EACH PACKAGE CONTAINS TWELVE X 12 OUNCE CANS OF HOG SLAT 3778 BLUE FLAMMABLE HIGH PERFORMANCE SPRAY PAINT. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOXES. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBERS TO THE SAME CONSIGNEE ARE 1ZR33A051599342427, 1ZR33A051595895632, 1ZR33A051595760045 AND 1ZR33A051597999651. THESE PACKAGES HAVE NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THE PACKAGES WERE SHIPPED USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER R33A05, HEARTLAND PRODUCTS COMPANY, RR 2 BOX 124, COLUMBUS NE 68601.
